pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'M5 Forecasting' Challenges Data // Contains functions, which facilitate downloading, loading and preparing data from 'M5 Forecasting' challenges (by 'University of Nicosia', hosted on 'Kaggle'). The data itself is set of time series of different product sales in 'Walmart'. The package also includes a ready- to-use built-in M5 subset named 'tiny_m5'. For detailed information about the challenges, see: Makridakis, S. Spiliotis, E. Assimakopoulos, V. (2020). doi:10.1016/j.ijforecast.2021.10.009.
